title: Plague Doctor's Cure
description: A deadly plague is spreading across the realm. The player must assist a reclusive plague doctor in creating a cure using rare ingredients from dangerous lands.
subquest: Locate the reclusive plague doctor and gain their trust.
Journey to the haunted forest to find a rare herb.
Brave the toxic swamps to collect a venomous creature's secretion.
Solve the riddles in the ancient ruins to obtain a mystical flower.
Face the monstrous guardian protecting the final ingredient.
Assist the plague doctor in crafting the lifesaving cure.
